nodes.text: Wasskah was a moon of Trandosha in the Kashyyyk system.

The moon was colonized by the Trandoshans.
During the Clone Wars, it was the site of a Trandoshan hunting party that captured sentients from various parts of the galaxy and brought them onto the moon to use as prey. Jedi Padawan Ahsoka Tano was captured by the hunters and brought to Wasskah. Tano attempted to save several other Padawans who had also been captured and stranded there. The surviving Padawans banded together with the captured Wookiee Chewbacca and managed to contact his friend, General Tarfful, who arrived with a rescue team. The Trandoshan gang was wiped out in the skirmish.
